title: Task bar displaying during Lol games. Causes game window to close
body: If  I so much as click on an application near the task bar it will open and close the clients window. So many kills lost. Anyone know how to fix this? Im running on windows 10. I've found a "temp. fix" by placing my task bar at the top of my screen but this is still problematic when using free creen not to mention its just odd. Anyone?

replies.body: Are you on a 4K?  While in game, what screen mode are you running the game in?  It sounds like Windowed mode.  What happens if you try Fullscreen mode or Borderless?  This should be available in-game via your video options.  Let me know if that helps.
